definition: to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request

sentences.english: May I have your name again,please.
Would you like to use ampoule?
sentences.chinese: 请问你喜欢加精华素吗？

sentences.english: C. Sorry , I don"t know Pleaseask the policeman over there."
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我不知道，请问那边的警察。

sentences.english: Sir, would you like to pay in cash or sign your bill?
sentences.chinese: 先生，请问您是用现金结账还是签单啊？

sentences.english: Excuse me. What's the time difference betweeen Beijing and London?
sentences.chinese: 请问北京和伦敦的时差是多少？

sentences.english: Is there any dinning car on the train?
sentences.chinese: 请问这列车上有咐餐厅吗？

sentences.english: Do you want to pre-register the Following Fair?
sentences.chinese: 请问阁下是否有兴趣优先登记以下展览会？

sentences.english: 12-30 "Please madam, to where may we take you?
sentences.chinese: 夫人，请问，我们该把您送到什么地方去呢？

sentences.english: Do you have a transfer service from airport to hotel free of charge?
sentences.chinese: 请问贵酒店有没有免费接机服务？

sentences.english: Please ask you do I want to how learn and then can say that thing that I do out?
sentences.chinese: 请问你我要怎么学才能把我说的那个东西做出来呀？

sentences.english: Would you like some soup or appetizer to start with you meal ?
sentences.chinese: 请问你要不要先点头盘或汤？

sentences.english: Could I have your name please?
Does your work environment encourage you to work?
sentences.chinese: 请问你的工作环境能激励你工作吗？

sentences.english: Will the first to use contraceptives, "Yasmin", can reduce the dose of their own?
sentences.chinese: 请问初次用避孕药“优思明”，可否自行减小剂量？

sentences.english: Can I speak to Kylie, please?
sentences.chinese: 请问我可以和凯莉说话吗？

sentences.english: It's 120 yuan . Would you like to pay in cash or bill it to your room?
sentences.chinese: 一共是120元。请问怎样付款，付现金还是入房帐？

definition: to ask (a question) in reply/to answer a question with a question/rhetorical question
youngest/most junior/tiny/one (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers, esp. on telephone or in military)/one or ace on dice or dominoes/variant of 吆[yao1], to shout

particle indicating that a previously asked question is to be applied to the preceding word ("What about ...?", "And ...?")/particle for inquiring about location ("Where is ...?")/particle signaling a pause, to emphasize the preceding words and allow the listener time to take them on board ("ok?", "are you with me?")/(at the end of a declarative sentence) particle indicating continuation of a state or action/particle indicating strong affirmation
to question/to ask/to raise a question
variant of 怎麼了|怎么了[zen3 me5 le5]
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
how?/how about?/how was it?/how are things?
